channel.description:
[url=https://www.imagebam.com/image/43af3f164973967]![](upload://fdNF4F6WMQFveZgreQ9LOKR50s6.jpeg)[/url] [url=https://www.imagebam.com/image/12d4d8164973981]![](upload://jpEmsapXVYLB9a8Eb2yOXGyZ8sM.jpeg)[/url] [url=https://www.imagebam.com/image/9770c6164974005]![](upload://pCbWALF9ohiC3LRkkZHe84clhiX.jpeg)[/url] [url=https://www.imagebam.com/image/fe6596164974022]![](upload://jkWI4ECZItUA3yqwOLFSqbe73Ud.jpeg)[/url] [url=https://www.imagebam.com/image/c59293164974036][img]https://thumbnails13.imagebam.com/16498/c59293164974036.jpg[/img][/url] [url=https://www.imagebam.com/image/a4d18f164974049]![](upload://2sQ5Xzm8jO692mPBpnxWsxQ77Rm.jpeg)[/url] [url=https://www.imagebam.com/image/677fe8164974060]![](upload://ktoDQe6y5mlfSTRjZPcl3JPAnkR.jpeg)[/url] [url=https://www.imagebam.com/image/8316dd164974068]![](upload://ns80ZAYCVKFrZpUYfoLwzq1XWFY.jpeg)[/url] [url=https://www.imagebam.com/image/776e89164974103]![](upload://a01wrbNdQB4g5RrfrX6DIigp3QH.jpeg)[/url] [url=https://www.imagebam.com/image/afa164164974164]![](upload://wAK3hJkgALONlLwgzJPqEdkUTmz.jpeg)[/url]
[b]dm_nightmare_church (BETA5) Dec 28th 2011[/b]
This is a scary church map for HL2DM. The map took 8 months to build, alot of that time was making the map look nice.
I'm looking for feedback any kind so I can improve the map, so post what you think so far for this BETA stage!
View Beta updates that have been made so far. Link [url]https://www.bloodsuckers.de/topic.php?t=2789[/url]
The map has won "Map of the Month" Link [url]https://www.bloodsuckers.de/topic.php?t=2786[/url]
Keep an eye out for secrets/hidden things as I added lots. :slight_smile: This map is nearly out of a Beta
---> [b]Download (Beta 5)[/b] 59MB .BZ2 (Last Updated Dec 28th 2011) [url]https://gtamike.tsgk.com/my_maps/hl2mp/maps/dm_nightmare_church_b5.bsp.bz2[/url]
If you don't have HL2 Deathmatch it's for free with Nvidia / ATI cards [url]https://www.halflife2.net/forums/showthread.php?141652-HL2-Deathmatch-for-free-with-Nvidia-ATI-cards[/url]

item.title: HL2DM: dm_nightmare_church (Map - BETA 5)
item.dc:creator: gtamike_TSGK
item.description:
The dev stage is 99% complete anymore changes will not be that noticeable, the map is on hold for now.

Yes there was things that jump out at you but I won’t show them in a video.
You can load the map in garrys mod to it’s not as smooth as hl2dm but playable.

Read full topic

item.title: HL2DM: dm_nightmare_church (Map - BETA 5)
item.dc:creator: Eion_Kilant_739
item.description:
Looks like a masterpiece.

Does any thing literaly pop out at the player though? Such as an animation or a sound cue of someone screaming loudly?

Anyway, when this is finished I’m going to see what other gamemodes it will fit nicely with.

item.title: HL2DM: dm_nightmare_church (Map - BETA 5)
item.dc:creator: gtamike_TSGK
item.description:
At last I got my old school friend to take a picture of his art work of the church, on October 2011 he saw a preview of my map dm_nightmare_church".
My map inspired him to make a painting that includes many visual features the map has.
E.G. body in bush, blood water fountain, clock tower, owl in tree, evil doll, and some building design features my church has and more!

This artist has also done concept art for me in the past for my maps called “dm_lost_base_bcc_final and dm_unreal_factory_hd_b1”.
This is the first map Illustration art work i’ve got from him and i’m very impressed.

I’ve added the image in attachment for others to download and zoom in to see the small details.
Taken with 14 megapixel camera for details to be seen.


Image by: Alex Brown (my old school friend)
Church Illustration Art Painting Picuture (Front Cover For Map)

Image Download (zip)
https://www.mediafire.com/?03v07z1uatvpj7n

Also here’s a OLD BUILD of the map (Beta 1) There’s alot of things I didn’t show in the video.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CEZQv-v-oD8

Read full topic

dm_nightmare_church (BETA5) Dec 28th 2011

This is a scary church map for HL2DM. The map took 8 months to build, alot of that time was making the map look nice.

I’m looking for feedback any kind so I can improve the map, so post what you think so far for this BETA stage!
